explains: vt. 根除，连根拔起；迫使某人离开出生地或定居处
vi. 迁离；改变生活方式

sentences.en: We decided to uproot and head for Scotland.
He had no wish to uproot Dena from her present home.
sentences.cn: 他没想让德娜搬离她现在的家。

sentences.en: They had been forced to uproot their vines and plant wheat.
sentences.cn: 他们早已被迫把葡萄藤连根拔起，种上小麦。
